backend/main.mo: Motoko canister answering user questions with pattern-matched predefined responses for topics like costs, privacy, science, and ICP info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding, asset integration, and theming requirements with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, hooks, styles, Tailwind config, and index.html.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file showing how to configure the VITE_DEPLOYMENT_URL variable.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining warm OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the AI Logic title and favicon and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React chat UI handling messages, backend queries, example prompts, and displaying branding images in the header.
frontend/src/components/AppLinkSection.t: Component showing the deployment URL with copy-to-clipboard support and fallback text when unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and login state transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query mutation for sending questions to the backend actor with validation and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/deployConfig.ts: Exports the deployment URL from environment variables for displaying shareable links.
frontend/src/lib/domainValidation.ts: Provides domain normalization and validation enforcing 5â€“50 chars of letters, numbers, and hyphens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens tied to CSS variables, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and branding image tasks.
